login/acceptTermsText: By clicking continue, you agree to our <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.
signup/acceptTermsText: By clicking continue, you agree to our <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.
sitemapy/hero/description: Add your website url or directly your sitemap's url. We will check this and show you usefull data and statistics. Sitemap managment has never been so easy.
sitemap-status-bar/status_code: The status code of the sitemap is {status_code}.
sitemap-status-bar/total_pages: The total number of pages in the sitemap is {total_pages}.
sitemap-status-bar/response_time: The response time of the sitemap is {response_time}ms.
sitemap-status-bar/updated_at: The sitemap was last updated at {updated_at}.
sitemap-status-bar/type: The type of the sitemap is {type}.
organization/create/description: An organization is a group of users who share the same access to the same resources.
organization/create/input/name/error/len: Name must be at least 1 character.
select-language-modal/description: Please select the language you want to change to.
api/api-key-input/reset-api-key-title: Are you sure to reset the API Key?
api/api-key-input/reset-api-key-descript: By resetting the API Key, services that use the old API Key will stop working.
